title: How to Send Invoices via Email?
body:
Follow these steps on how to send invoice using email on Demand:
Open Patient Record
Click Accounts > Tick the box if the preferred invoice > Click Print
Under the "Destination" section, select "Save as PDF" to download the results and Click Save
 

Go back to the Patient Record 
Click Clinical Tab and Select Correspondence OUT
Click Import and fill all required field.
*NOTE: The required fields as follows: Set the 'Status' to 'Final,' select 'Any Subject and Details' ,choose the 'Billing' category, and upload the invoice files.
Click Save

For additional steps in sending invoice to patient or contacts using email on demand, please see this article. How to Send an Email to Contacts or Patient.
  What is Email on Demand?
